CustomField.formula: OR( OrderPaymentSummaryType__c = "PIX", CONTAINS(OrderPaymentSummaryType__c, "IDEAL"), CONTAINS(OrderPaymentSummaryType__c, "KCB_RBT"), CONTAINS(OrderPaymentSummaryType__c, "KCB_ACC"), CONTAINS(OrderPaymentSummaryType__c, "Klarna"), CONTAINS(OrderPaymentSummaryType__c, "PAYPAL"), CONTAINS(OrderPaymentSummaryType__c, "APPLE_PAY"), OrderPaymentSummaryType__c = "Credit Card", OrderPaymentSummaryType__c = "Amex", OrderPaymentSummaryType__c = "Visa", OrderPaymentSummaryType__c = "MasterCard", OrderPaymentSummaryType__c = "ELO", OrderPaymentSummaryType__c = "JCB", OrderPaymentSummaryType__c = "DinersClub", OrderPaymentSummaryType__c = "Discover" )
CustomField.label: Tech_AutomaticRefund_Button
